trends: There have been 27 other sightings in Providence
There were no other sightings in Providence on or around September 19th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsI went outside the main inn(Castle hill Inn & Resort) to speak with the valets and noticed a bright light in the sky giving off a triangular shape of white light. The ball of light just vanished and the remaining trangular shape of light slowly faded away. It was the most amazing thing i have ever seen in my life!
Summary: Looked like someone shining a flash light down from space
